summary: This bill, the "National Police Misuse of Force Investigation Board Act of 2025," establishes an independent federal board to investigate and report on incidents involving police brutality, including deaths in custody, officer-involved shootings, and uses of force causing severe injury. The Board will have the power to conduct investigations, issue subpoenas, and make recommendations for reform. It mandates responses to recommendations and requires public disclosure of information and reports. The bill also addresses support for families affected, and grant eligibility tied to compliance.
